author: G.V.R. Subba Rao
title: Heritage Foods donates ₹1 crore to CM’s Relief Fund of six States to fight COVID-19
description: We are going through unprecedented times. I urge each and everyone in the country to stay at home and be safe, says Vice Chairman and MD Nara Bhuvaneswari
content:
Heritage Foods Limited has decided to contribute 1crore to the nation towards the fight against COVID-19 pandemic in its major operating areas across the country.
Of the total, 30 lakh each would be donated to the Chief Ministers Relief Fund of Andhra Prades… [+539 chars]
